translation.en: He was the most extraordinary man I ever knew.
translation.zh: 他是我认识的人中最不同寻常的人

translation.en: Lord Allenby, could you give a few words about Lawrence?
translation.zh:
艾伦比勋爵，你能说些
关于劳伦斯的事吗？

translation.en: ...played a decisive part in the Middle Eastern campaign.
translation.zh: 在中东战役中起了决定性作用

translation.en: Yes, sir, but about Colonel Lawrence himself.
translation.zh: 是的，先生，说说劳伦斯上校本人

translation.en: No, no. I didn't know him well, you know.
translation.zh: 不，你知道的，我不是很了解他

translation.en: Mr. Bentley, you know as much about Lawrence as anybody.
translation.zh: 本特利先生，你很了解他

translation.en: Yes, it was my privilege to know him.
And to make him known to the world.
translation.zh: 让全世界的人知道他，是我的荣幸

translation.en: He was a poet, a scholar and a mighty warrior.
translation.zh: 他是诗人，学者，也是勇猛的战士

translation.en: He was also the most shameless exhibitionist since Barnum and Bailey.
translation.zh:
他也是继巴纳姆和贝利之后
最无耻，最喜欢出风头的人

translation.en: I overheard your last remark and take the gravest exception.
translation.zh:
我无意中听到你最后的评论
我很不满你的话

translation.en: -He was a great man. -Did you know him?
No, I can't claim to have known him.
I had the honor to shake his hand in Damascus.
translation.zh: 我很荣幸能在大马士革和他握手

translation.en: Knew him? I never knew him.
translation.zh: 认识他？我从来都不认识他

translation.en: He had some minor function on my staff in Cairo.
translation.zh: 他曾在开罗为我做些不重要的工作

translation.en: ...this is a nasty, dark little room.
translation.zh: 这是又脏又暗的小房间

translation.en: We are not happy in it.
I am. It's better than a nasty, dark little trench.
translation.zh:
我觉得不错，总比又脏又暗的
小战壕要好

translation.en: -Then you're a big noble fellow. -That's right.
translation.zh:
-那么你是位显赫的贵族吧
-没错

translation.en: Here is William Potter with my newspaper.
translation.zh: 威廉·波特拿着我的报纸进来了

translation.en: Would you care for one of Corporal Hartley's cigarettes?
translation.zh: 你想抽根哈特利下士的香烟吗？

translation.en: But I bet it isn't mentioned in the Times.
translation.zh: 但我打赌泰晤士报不会提到
贝都因部落攻击土耳其要塞

translation.en: I bet that no one in this headquarters even knows it happened.
translation.zh: 我打赌这司令部没人知道这事

translation.en: Or would care if it did. Allow me to ignite your cigarette.
translation.zh: 或者不在乎这事，我来帮你点烟

translation.en: You'll do that once too often. It's only flesh and blood.
translation.zh: 你经常做这种事，你只是血肉之躯

translation.en: Michael George Hartley, you're a philosopher.
translation.zh: 麦可·乔治·哈特利，你是哲学家

translation.en: The trick, William Potter, is not minding that it hurts.
translation.zh: 威廉·波特，诀窍就是不在乎会痛

translation.en: By the way, if Captain Gibbon should inquire for me...
translation.zh: 顺便说一下，如果吉朋上尉找我

translation.en: ...tell him I've gone for a chat with the general.
translation.zh: 告诉他，我去和将军聊天了

translation.en: Do you usually wear your cap in the mess?
translation.zh: 你通常在休息室也戴帽子吗？

translation.en: You should be on duty. Where are you going?
Mustn't talk shop, Freddie, not in the mess.
translation.zh:
别跟我说教
弗雷迪，别在休息室里说

translation.en: I'm going for a powwow with the general.
I'm not asking as your superior, but as the secretary of this mess.
translation.zh:
我不是以长官的身份问你
而是以休息室负责人的身份问你

translation.en: We don't want chaps in here who should be on duty.
translation.zh: 我们不要应当值班的人进来

translation.en: Ah, well, we can't all be lion tamers.
translation.zh: 不可能人人都是驯兽师

translation.en: I do not propose to let an overweening, crass lieutenant...
translation.zh: 我建议惩罚蔑视了司令官…

translation.en: ...thumb his nose at his commander and get away with it.
It doesn't sound as though he'd be any great loss, sir.
translation.zh: 听上去没有他，损失不大，长官

translation.en: Don't try that, Dryden. There's a principle involved.
translation.zh: 别那么做，德莱顿，这是原则问题

translation.en: He's of no use here in Cairo.
He might be in Arabia. He knows his stuff, sir.
translation.zh:
他也许该去阿拉伯
他很懂行，长官
你是说他会纸上谈兵吧

translation.en: I've already sent out Colonel Brighton, who's a soldier.
translation.zh: 我已经派了布莱顿上校，他是士兵

translation.en: If Brighton thinks we should send some arms, we will.
translation.zh:
如果布莱顿认为我们应该
派些人手去，我们就听他的

translation.en: Well, what more do you want?
That there would be no question of Lieutenant Lawrence...

translation.zh: 会给一些军事方面的建议的

translation.en: By God, I should hope not.
translation.zh: 天啊，我应该希望他不要那么做

translation.en: It's just that the Arab Bureau would like its own man on the spot to....
translation.zh:
只是阿拉伯分局
想要自己的人负责…

translation.en: To make our own appraisal of the situation.
I'll tell you, it's my considered opinion and that of my staff...
translation.zh: 我得告诉你，我和我的手下都认为

translation.en: ...that time spent on the Bedouin will be time wasted.
translation.zh: 费时间在贝都因人身上会徒劳无功
他们确实攻击了麦地那

translation.en: And the Turks made mincemeat of them.
translation.zh: 土耳其人狠狠教训了他们

translation.en: We know that they didn't take it. A storm in a teacup, a sideshow.
translation.zh:
我们知道他们没接受
小题大做，只是小插曲

translation.en: In my opinion, this whole theater of operations is a sideshow.
translation.zh: 我认为整个行动就是小插曲

translation.en: The real war's being fought against Germans, not Turks.
translation.zh:
真正的敌人是德国人
而不是土耳其人

translation.en: Not here, but on the Western front in the trenches.
translation.zh: 不是这里，而是西部前线的战壕里

translation.en: Your Bedouin Army, or whatever it calls itself...
translation.zh:
你的贝都因军队
不管他们怎么称呼自己

translation.en: ...would be a sideshow of a sideshow.
Big things have small beginnings, sir.
translation.zh:
伟大的事都是从小事
发展起来的，长官

translation.en: Does the Arab Bureau want a big thing in Arabia?
translation.zh:
阿拉伯分局想要阿拉伯
发生大事吗？

translation.en: Does the bureau think they'll sit down under us when this war is over?
translation.zh:
局里的人认为在这次战争结束后
他们会臣服于我们吗？

translation.en: The bureau thinks the job of the moment, sir, is to win the war.
translation.zh: 他们认为现在的任务是打胜仗

translation.en: Don't tell me my duty, Mr. Dryden.
translation.zh:
别来告诉我，我的任务是什么
德莱顿先生

translation.en: If you're insubordinate, I shall put you under arrest.
translation.zh: 如果你犯上，我会逮捕你的

translation.en: My manner. It looks insubordinate, but it isn't.
translation.zh: 举止，看上去是犯上，但不是的

translation.en: I can't make out whether you're bad-mannered or just half-witted.
translation.zh:
我不清楚你是举止不当
或者只是愚笨

translation.en: -I have the same problem, sir. -Shut up.
translation.zh:
-我也有相同的问题，长官
-闭嘴

translation.en: The Arab Bureau thinks you would be of use to them in Arabia.
translation.zh:
阿拉伯分局认为你在阿拉伯
能派上用场

translation.en: You can't perform your present duties properly.
translation.zh: 你无法正确完成你现在的任务

translation.en: "I cannot fiddle, but I can make a great state from a little city."
translation.zh:
我不会拉小提琴，但我能让小城市
变成伟大的国家

-什么？
-地米斯托克利的话，长官

translation.en: -A Greek philosopher. -I know you've been well-educated.
translation.zh:
-希腊哲学家
-我知道你受过高等教育

translation.en: It says so in your dossier.
translation.zh: 你的档案上就是这么写的

translation.en: You're the kind of creature I can't stand, Lawrence.
translation.zh: 我是我无法忍受的那种人，劳伦斯

translation.en: But I suppose I could be wrong.
All right, Dryden. You can have him for six weeks.
translation.zh: 好的，德莱顿，你可以使唤他六周

translation.en: Who knows? It might even make a man of him. Come in!
translation.zh:
谁知道呢？或许能把他变成男子汉
进来

translation.en: The convoy will be in Port Said tomorrow night.
There doesn't seem to be any artillery.
Sir, this is something of an expedition.
He has to get to Yenbo, find a guide, find the Arabs and then get back.
translation.zh:
他要去延布，找一个向导
找到阿拉伯人，然后回来

translation.en: He can't do that in six weeks.
All right, three. Now, will you let me do some work, Mr. Dryden?
translation.zh:
好吧，三个月
你能让我工作了吗，德莱顿先生？

translation.en: I'd like to say, sir, that I am grateful for this.
translation.zh:
长官，我想说的是
我很感激你

translation.en: How can I fight a bloody war without bloody artillery?
-How did you do it? -Might better ask why I bothered to.
translation.zh:
-你是怎么办到的？
-你该问我为何要为你这么费心

translation.en: -Because I'm the man for the job. -I just wonder about that.
translation.zh:
-因为我最适合做这工作
-我现在有点怀疑了

translation.en: Of course I am. What is the job, by the way?
translation.zh: 当然是我了，对了，什么任务？

translation.en: Good. And when I've found him?
Find out what kind of a man he is.
Find out what his intentions are. Not his immediate intentions.
translation.zh: 了解他的意图，不是当下的企图

translation.en: That is Colonel Brighton's business, not yours.
translation.zh: 那是布莱顿上校的任务

translation.en: I mean, his intentions in Arabia altogether.
translation.zh: 我是说，他对阿拉伯的企图
麦地那方圆三百英里内
他们是哈希姆贝都因人

translation.en: They can cross 60 miles of desert in a day.
translation.zh: 他们一天能在沙漠行走60英里

translation.en: Thanks. This is going to be fun.
Lawrence, only two kinds of creature get fun in the desert:
translation.zh:
劳伦斯，沙漠中只有两种生物
能够享乐

translation.en: Bedouins and gods, and you're neither. Take it from me.
translation.zh:
贝都因人和神明，你两者都不是
记住我的话

translation.en: For ordinary men, it's a burning fiery furnace.
translation.zh: 对普通人而言，那里是炽热的火炉

translation.en: No, Dryden. It's going to be fun.
translation.zh: 不，德莱顿，这会很有趣的

translation.en: It is recognized that you have a funny sense of fun.
translation.zh: 大家都认为你对乐趣的看法很奇怪

translation.en: Truly, now, you are a British officer?

translation.zh:
-你不是从开罗骑骆驼来的？
-不

translation.en: Thank heaven. It's 900 miles. I came by boat.
translation.zh:
谢天谢地，那可有九百英里远
我乘船来的

translation.en: No. A fat country. Fat people.
First I take you to Lord Feisal, then you give it to me.
translation.zh:
首先我带你去见费萨尔大人
然后你把它给我

translation.en: From here to Lord Feisal's camp is Harith country.
translation.zh:
从这里到费萨尔大人的营地
是哈里斯国

translation.en: Put the right foot in tight. Lock it with your left foot.
When you are ready to go...
...hit her on the shoulder and say, "Hut-hut-hut."
Today will be difficult, but tomorrow, good riding.
translation.zh: 今天会很辛苦，但明天就轻松了

translation.en: I think we reach Masturah Well tomorrow. Yes.
translation.zh: 我认为我们明天能到马斯杜拉井

translation.en: And from Masturah Well to Lord Feisal's camp, one day more.
translation.zh: 从那里到费萨尔大人营地只要一天

translation.en: The Harith are a dirty people.
...was a Hazimi of the Beni Salem.
translation.zh: 是贝尼莎伦的哈奇米人

translation.en: I am Ali ibn el Kharish.

translation.zh: 哈米奇人在这里做什么？

translation.en: He was taking me to help Prince Feisal.
translation.zh: 他要带我去帮助费萨尔王子

-你是开罗那边派来的人？
-是的

translation.en: I have been in Cairo for my schooling.
I can both read and write.
My Lord Feisal already has an Englishman.
translation.zh: 已经有个英国人帮费萨尔大人忙了

translation.en: My name is for my friends.
None of my friends is a murderer.
The Hazimi may not drink at our wells.
translation.zh: 哈奇米人不能喝我们井里的水

translation.en: So long as the Arabs fight tribe against tribe...
translation.zh: 只要阿拉伯的部落内战不休

translation.en: ...so long will they be a little people...
Greedy, barbarous and cruel, as you are.
translation.zh: 跟你一样贪婪、野蛮、残忍

translation.en: I will take you to Feisal.
I do not want your company, sherif.
Wadi Safra is another day from here.
translation.zh: 瓦迪萨弗拉距离这里还有一天路程

translation.en: You will not find it, and you will die.
I will find it with this.
Then you would be a thief.

translation.zh: 愿真主与你同在，英国人

translation.en: -I've been waiting for you. -Did you know I was coming?
translation.zh:
-我一直在等你
-你知道我要来？

translation.en: I knew someone was coming. Feisal told me.
translation.zh: 我知道有人会来，费萨尔告诉我的

translation.en: Not much happens within 50 miles of Feisal that he doesn't know.
translation.zh:
费萨尔知道方圆50英里
发生的所有事

translation.en: I'll give him that. No escort?
translation.zh: 他有这个能力，没人陪你来？

translation.en: My guide was killed at the Masturah Well.
translation.zh: 我的向导在马斯杜拉井那被杀死了

translation.en: -This is Wadi Safra, isn't it? -Yes, they're over there.
translation.zh:
-这是瓦迪萨弗拉吧
-对，他们在那边

translation.en: Just a minute. What's your name and who sent you?
translation.zh:
等一等，你叫什么名字？
谁派你来的？

translation.en: Lawrence. I've been seconded to the Arab Bureau.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯，我隶属于阿拉伯分局

translation.en: What are you to do for the Arab Bureau?
translation.zh: 你要为阿拉伯分局做什么？

translation.en: Well, it's rather vague, sir. I'm to appreciate the situation.
translation.zh:
不是很清楚，长官
我是来了解这里的情况

translation.en: Well, that won't be difficult. The situation's bloody awful.
Their morale, if they ever had any, which I doubt...
translation.zh: 他们的士气，我怀疑他们是否有

translation.en: ...the Turks knocked out of them in front of Medina, with howitzers.
translation.zh:
土耳其人在麦地那
用榴弹炮将他们的士气击散

translation.en: They're fading away by dozens every night.
translation.zh: 每晚都有好几十个人死掉

translation.en: What I want to say is this:
Wherever you are and whoever you are with...
translation.zh: 无论你在哪，你和谁在一起

translation.en: ...you're a British officer. Here's an order.
translation.zh: 你是英国军官，这是命令

translation.en: When we get into that camp, you're to keep your mouth shut.
translation.zh: 我们进入那个营地后，你得闭上嘴

translation.en: -Do you understand what I'm saying? -I understand what you're saying.
You'll make your appreciation and get back to--
I've told him! God knows I've told him.
translation.zh: 我告诉过他，我告诉过他了

translation.en: "Move South," I've said. "You're still in range."
translation.zh:
我说，往南移动
你还在敌方射程内

translation.en: They simply will not understand what modern weapons do!
translation.zh: 他们根本不了解现代武器的威力

translation.en: Stand and fight. Stand and fight.
This is a bloody mess, sir. We'll have to move south.
translation.zh: 真是一团糟，我们得向南移动

translation.en: You were right and I was wrong.
We must take some thought for the wounded.
translation.zh: 我们必须考虑如何处理伤者

translation.en: -We can take care of them at Yenbo. -If they can get to Yenbo.
translation.zh:
-我们可以到延布再治疗他们
-如果他们能撑到延布的话

translation.en: They can hardly come with us.
translation.zh: 他们没法和我们一起走

translation.en: No. They must try to reach Yenbo. Lieutenant...?
translation.zh:
不，他们必须努力赶去延布
中尉…

translation.en: ...my people are unused to explosives and machines.
translation.zh: 我的人不熟悉炸药和机器

translation.en: First the guns, and now this.
Please, Your Excellency. Just one for two?
translation.zh: 拜托了，阁下，就给我们俩一根烟

translation.en: We can do everything. Light fires, cook food, wash clothes.
translation.zh:
我们什么都会做，生火、做饭
洗衣服

translation.en: -It will be very nice for you. -I can't afford it.
Recite, then, as much of the Koran as may be easy to you.
translation.zh: 那么尽可能地朗诵可兰经吧

translation.en: God knoweth that there be some among you sick...
translation.zh: 真主知道你们中将有一些病人

translation.en: ...while others travel through the Earth in quest for the bounties of God.
translation.zh: 其他人旅行四方，寻求真主的恩惠

translation.en: Others do battle in his cause.
Recite, therefore, as much as may be easy.
This will be best and richest in the recompense.
translation.zh: 将在真主那里得到更多更好的报酬

translation.en: Seek ye the forgiveness of God.
Lieutenant Lawrence, you have met Sherif Ali, I think.
translation.zh:
劳伦斯中尉，我认为
你见过阿里首领了

translation.en: ...and by the night when it darkeneth...
And surely the future shall be better for thee than the past."
translation.zh: 你的未来肯定比过去好

translation.en: "And in the end shall your Lord be bounteous to thee...
translation.zh: 最后真主将会慷慨地赐福于你

translation.en: -I want a decision, sir. -You want me to fall back on Yenbo.
translation.zh:
-我要你做决定，先生
-你想要我撤退回延布

translation.en: Well, you're not doing much good here, sir.
translation.zh: 你在这里做不了什么，先生

translation.en: I'm sorry to rub it in, sir, but we can't supply you here.
translation.zh:
我很抱歉这么说
但在这，我们无法给你们提供补给

translation.en: You could supply us through Aqaba!
translation.zh: 你们可以通过亚喀巴给我们补给

translation.en: If you can get ahold of Aqaba, we can supply you.
translation.zh:
如果你能占领亚喀巴
我们就能给你们补给

translation.en: The Turks have 12-inch guns at Aqaba, sir.
translation.zh:
土耳其人在亚喀巴部署了
12英寸的机关枪

translation.en: Can you imagine what that means?
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: Put that out of your mind, sir. The navy's got other things to do.
translation.zh: 别想了，海军还有别的任务

translation.en: Oh, yes. Protecting the Suez Canal.
The one essential sector of this front is and must be the canal.
translation.zh: 运河对这个前线相当重要

translation.en: You can see that, sir, surely.
I see that the canal is an essential British interest.
translation.zh: 我知道运河对于英国人很重要

translation.en: It is of little consequence to us.
translation.zh: 对我们来说，没什么大不了的

translation.en: I must ask you not to speak like that.
British and Arab interests are one and the same.
translation.zh: 英国和阿拉伯的目的是相同的

translation.en: Upon my word, sir, you're ungrateful.
translation.zh: 先生，我得说你忘恩负义

translation.en: Fall back on Yenbo and we will give you equipment.
translation.zh: 撤退到延布，我们给你装备

translation.en: Give you arms, advice, training, everything.
translation.zh:
给你武器、军事建议、训练
什么都可以

translation.en: Guns like the Turkish guns at Medina.
translation.zh: 土耳其人在麦地那用的枪

translation.en: Yes, give us guns and keep the training.
translation.zh: 是的，给我们枪，训练我们

translation.en: Your men need training far more than guns, sir.
translation.zh: 比起枪支，你的人更需要的是训练

translation.en: English will teach Bedu to fight?
translation.zh: 英国人会教贝都因人如何战斗？

translation.en: We will teach them, Sherif Ali, to fight a modern mechanized army.
translation.zh:
阿里首领，我们会教他们
对抗现代机械化军队

translation.en: Yes, lieutenant? What do you think about Yenbo?
translation.zh: 是的，中尉？你怎么看延布？

translation.en: I think it is far from Damascus.
translation.zh: 我认为那里离大马士革很远

translation.en: We'll have you in Damascus, sir. Never fear.
translation.zh:
我们会帮你打下大马士革的
别害怕

translation.en: Have you been in Damascus, Mr. Lawrence?
translation.zh: 你去过大马士革吗，劳伦斯先生？

translation.en: It is beautiful, is it not?
Dreaming won't get you to Damascus, but discipline will.
translation.zh:
梦想是没法帮你占领大马士革的
但是纪律可以做到

translation.en: Look, Great Britain is a small country, much smaller than yours.
translation.zh:
英国的国土面积很小
比你的国家还小
与一些国家相比，人口也少

translation.en: It's small, but it's great. And why?
-Because it has guns. -Because it has discipline.
Because it has a navy, because of this...
...and strike where they please. This makes them great.
translation.zh: 想攻击哪里都行，所以他们才强大

translation.en: Lawrence is not your military adviser.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯不是你的军事顾问

translation.en: But I would like to hear his opinion.
Damn it! Who do you take your orders from?
From Lord Feisal, in Feisal's tent.
translation.zh:
在费萨尔的帐篷里
我听费萨尔大人的

translation.en: Old fool! Why turn from him to him? They are master and man.
translation.zh:
老笨蛋，为何问完他又问他？
他是主人，他是随从

translation.en: I think your book is right.
The desert is an ocean in which no oar is dipped.
On this ocean, the Bedu go where they please...
translation.zh: 在这片海洋，贝都因人想去哪去哪

translation.en: This is the way the Bedu has always fought.
translation.zh: 贝都因人一直都是这样作战的

translation.en: You're famed through the world for fighting this way.
translation.zh: 你以这种作战方式闻名世界

translation.en: And this is the way you should fight now.
translation.zh: 你现在正应该这样作战

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir, but you're wrong.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，长官，但你错了

translation.en: Fall back on Yenbo, the Arab Rising becomes one unit in the British army.
translation.zh:
撤退回延布，阿拉伯起义军
与英国军队联合起来

translation.en: -What is this to you? -You're a traitor.
translation.zh:
-这对你有什么好处？
-你是叛徒

translation.en: He is a young man, and young men are passionate.
translation.zh: 他是年轻人，年轻人满腔热情

translation.en: But wiser people must decide. I know you are right.
translation.zh:
但得由聪明人做决定
我知道你说得对

translation.en: Very well. When shall we move? The sooner the better.
translation.zh: 很好，我们何时出发？越快越好
你今晚会再失去50个手下

translation.en: I will give you my answer tomorrow. And now...
translation.zh: 我明天会告诉你我的决定，现在…

translation.en: Colonel Brighton means to put my men...
translation.zh: 布莱德上校想把我的人…
因为土耳其人有欧洲人的枪支

translation.en: But I fear to do it...

translation.zh: 我以灵魂发誓，我真的害怕

translation.en: The English have a great hunger for desolate places.
translation.zh: 英国人渴望得到荒凉之地

translation.en: I fear they hunger for Arabia.
translation.zh: 我怕他们想要拿下阿拉伯

translation.en: Then you must deny it to them.
You are an Englishman. Are you not loyal to England?
translation.zh: 你是英国人，你不忠于英国吗？

translation.en: To England and to other things.
translation.zh: 我忠于英国和其他事情
同时忠于英国和阿拉伯？

translation.en: I think you are another of these desert-loving English.
translation.zh: 我认为你也是喜欢沙漠的英国人

translation.en: We love water and green trees. There is nothing in the desert.
translation.zh:
我们爱水和绿树
沙漠里什么都没有

translation.en: Or is it that you think we are something you can play with...
translation.zh: 或者你们觉得我们是你们能玩弄的

translation.en: ...because we are a little people, a silly people...
translation.zh: 因为我们是弱小愚蠢的民族

translation.en: Or do you know, lieutenant, in the Arab city of Cordoba...
translation.zh: 中尉，你知道阿拉伯城市科多巴

translation.en: ...were two miles of lighting in the streets...
translation.zh: 两英里长的街道都设有路灯

translation.en: Time to be great again, my lord.
translation.zh: 该是你们再度强大的时候了，大人

translation.en: Which is why my father made this war upon the Turks.
translation.zh: 所以我父亲与土耳其人作战

translation.en: My father, Mr. Lawrence, not the English.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯先生，我父亲不是英国人

translation.en: ...I long for the vanished gardens of Cordoba.
translation.zh: 我渴望着废弃的科多巴花园

translation.en: However, before the gardens must come the fighting.
translation.zh: 然而要想得到花园，必须先打仗

translation.en: To be great again, it seems that we need the English...
translation.zh: 想再次强大，似乎我们需要英国人

translation.en: What no man can provide, Mr. Lawrence.
translation.zh: 那是没人能提供的，劳伦斯先生

translation.en: To come to Aqaba by land we should have to cross the Nefud Desert.
translation.zh:
经由陆路到亚喀巴
我们得穿过内夫得沙漠
没人能穿越内夫得沙漠

translation.en: I'll cross it if you will.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意的话，我能做到

translation.en: You? It takes more than a compass, Englishman.
translation.zh: 你？只靠罗盘是做不到的，英国人

translation.en: The Nefud is the worst place God created.
translation.zh:
内夫得沙漠是真主创造的
最可怕的地方

translation.en: I can't answer for the place. Only for myself.
translation.zh:
我不知道那沙漠有多可怕
我会为我的行为负责

translation.en: If 50 men came out of the Nefud...
translation.zh: 如果50个士兵能穿越亚喀巴沙漠

translation.en: ...they would be 50 men other men might join.
The Howeitat are there, I hear.
translation.zh: 我听说哈威塔特人在那里

translation.en: The Howeitat are brigands. They'll sell themselves to anyone.
translation.zh:
哈威塔特人是土匪
他们愿意把自己出卖给任何人

translation.en: Yes. There are guns at Aqaba.
They face the sea, Sherif Ali, and cannot be turned around.
translation.zh:
机关枪面对大海，阿里首领
而且不能转向

translation.en: From the landward side, there are no guns at Aqaba.
translation.zh: 亚喀巴没有冲着陆地的机关枪

translation.en: With good reason. It cannot be approached from the landward side.
translation.zh:
那是有原因的
没办法经由陆路到亚喀巴

translation.en: Certainly the Turks don't dream of it.
It's only a matter of going.
And where are you going, lieutenant?
Blasphemy is a bad beginning for such a journey.
translation.zh:
这样的旅程以亵渎神明的言辞开始
可不好

translation.en: You are falling back from Yenbo, sir?
translation.zh: 你要从延布撤退吗，先生？

translation.en: But I will spare these to you.
Did Ali break confidence to tell me?
translation.zh: 阿里是否是违反誓言告诉我的？

translation.en: Sherif Ali owes you his allegiance, my lord.
translation.zh: 阿里首领对您效忠，大人

translation.en: Yet you did not tell Colonel Brighton.
translation.zh: 但你没告诉布莱顿上校

translation.en: ...we can claim to arrive in the name of Feisal of Mecca.
translation.zh: 我们可以以麦加费萨尔之名征讨

translation.en: Yes, Lieutenant Lawrence, you may claim it.
translation.zh: 是的，劳伦斯中尉，你可以那么说

translation.en: But in whose name do you ride?
translation.zh: 但你以谁的名义征讨亚喀巴呢？

translation.en: Sherif, I caught them. They have tracked us.
translation.zh:
首领，我抓到了他们
他们一直跟踪我们

translation.en: They were here. I caught them.
translation.zh: 他们到这里，我抓住他们
你们为何要来这里？小子
为劳伦斯大人服务，首领

translation.en: This is true, Lawrence. They do wish it.
translation.zh:
是真的，劳伦斯
他们真的希望这么做

translation.en: Our camel strayed. We followed her.
translation.zh: 骆驼走失了，我们跟着它

translation.en: She led us here to be Lord Lawrence's servants.
translation.zh:
它带我们到这里
做劳伦斯大人的仆人

-这是阿拉的旨意
-你们亵渎神明

translation.en: No, Lawrence, these are not servants. These are outcasts, parent-less.
translation.zh:
不，劳伦斯，他们不是仆人
他们无父无母，是被放逐的人

translation.en: Be warned. They are not suitable.
translation.zh: 我得警告你，他们不适合做仆人

translation.en: They sound very suitable. You can ride with the baggage.
translation.zh:
看起来挺适合的，你们可以乘
载货的骆驼

translation.en: These are not servants. These are worshippers.
translation.zh: 他们不是仆人，他们是信徒

translation.en: They will be lucky for you. Allah favors the compassionate.
translation.zh: 他们很幸运，阿拉喜欢仁慈的人

translation.en: From here until the other side, no water but what we carry.
translation.zh:
从这里到另一边，没有水
只有我们带来的水

translation.en: For the camels, no water at all.
And in 20 days they will start to die.
There's no time to waste, then, is there?
translation.zh: 那就别浪费时间了，对吧？

translation.en: Yes. It will not happen again.
From now on, we must travel by night...
translation.zh: 从现在起，我们晚上前进

translation.en: ...and rest while it is too hot to travel.
translation.zh: 热到不能走的时候休息
我们为何不现在就出发呢？

translation.en: There is no rest now short of water.
translation.zh: 现在不能休息了，水不够了

translation.en: And how much of that is there?
But however much, it must be crossed before tomorrow's sun gets up.
translation.zh:
但不管有多远，明天太阳升起前
我们必须穿过去

translation.en: No, but we're off the anvil.
Lawrence, I do not think you know how you have tempted him.
translation.zh:
劳伦斯，我不认为你知道
你是怎么怂恿他的

translation.en: When do we reach the wells?
-Then we've done it. -Thank him, Lawrence. Thank him.
translation.zh:
-那么我们就成功了
-感谢真主，劳伦斯

translation.en: For what? He will be dead by midday.
translation.zh: 为什么？他到了中午就会死的

translation.en: What for, to die with Gasim?
translation.zh: 为什么，和加西姆一起死？

translation.en: In one hour comes the sun.
In God's name, understand! We cannot go back!
translation.zh:
以真主的名义，好好想想
我们不能回去

translation.en: If you go back, you kill yourself, is all.
Gasim's time is come, Lawrence. It is written.
translation.zh: 天注定加西姆要死了，劳伦斯

translation.en: What did you bring us here for with your blasphemous conceit?
translation.zh:
你为什么要带我们到这里？
你是一个亵渎神明又自大的人

translation.en: You will not be at Aqaba, English!
translation.zh: 你到不了亚喀巴的，英国人

translation.en: ...but you will not be at Aqaba.
Truly, for some men nothing is written unless they write it.
translation.zh:
真的，那些不相信命运的人
总是要眼见为实
我不叫阿尔劳伦斯，就叫劳伦斯

-阿尔劳伦斯听上去好听些
-是的

translation.en: Your father too, just Mr. Lawrence?
translation.zh: 你爸爸也只是叫劳伦斯先生吗？

translation.en: My father is Sir Thomas Chapman.
translation.zh: 我父亲叫托马斯·查普曼爵士

translation.en: -Is that a lord? -A kind of lord.
Then when he dies, you too will be a lord.
translation.zh: 那么他死后，你也会成为贵族吗？

translation.en: But then, I do not understand this. Your father's name is Chapman.
translation.zh: 我不明白，你父亲姓查普曼

translation.en: It seems to me that you are free to choose your own name, then.
translation.zh: 我认为你可以自由选择自己的姓氏

translation.en: All right, I'll settle for Al Lawrence.
translation.zh: 好吧，那就叫阿尔劳伦斯吧

translation.en: They are the robes of a sherif of the Beni Wejh.
translation.zh: 这是班尼威部落首领的长袍

translation.en: -Great honor. -The honor is to us. Salaam, sherif.
translation.zh:
-很荣幸
-我们很荣幸，你好，首领

translation.en: He for whom nothing is written may write himself a clan.
translation.zh:
命运由自己决定的人
可以建一个自己的部落

translation.en: They are good for riding. Try.
translation.zh: 穿袍子骑骆驼很方便，试试看

translation.en: Are you with those dogs drinking at my well?
translation.zh:
你和那些从我的井里
取水喝的狗在一起吗？

translation.en: I've heard of another man of that name.
translation.zh: 我听说过另一个和你同名的人
另一个人？什么另一个人？

translation.en: The Auda I'd heard of wouldn't need to summon help to look after his wells.
translation.zh:
我听说的那个奥达
不需要找人帮忙来看护他的井

translation.en: He must be a great hero.
He wouldn't refuse water to men coming out of Nefud Desert.
translation.zh:
他不会拒绝提供水给
那些从内夫得沙漠走出来的人

translation.en: No, that must be some other man.

translation.zh: 儿子，这是哪个民族的服装？

-这是哈里斯的服装
-哈里斯的什么部落？

translation.en: It is Auda of the Howeitat who speaks.
It is Ali of the Harith who answers.
Does Auda take me for one of his own bastards?
translation.zh: 奥达认为我是他的私生子吗？

-奥达在恭维我
-你真容易满足

translation.en: We are 50, you are two. How if we shot you down?
translation.zh:
我们有50个人，你们只有2个人
如果我们开枪杀死你们呢？

translation.en: Why, then you have a blood feud with the Howeitat.
translation.zh: 那么你们就与哈威塔特人结仇了

translation.en: -Do you desire it? -Not the generals in Cairo...
translation.zh:
-你希望那样吗？
-开罗的将军们不想
土耳其的国王也不希望这样

translation.en: I've only just begun to teach him.
And what are you teaching him today? Howeitat hospitality?
translation.zh:
你今天教他什么
哈威塔特人的待客之道吗？

translation.en: Be not clever with me, English.
-Who is he? -A friend of Prince Feisal's.

translation.zh:
-你希望我殷勤款待你吗？
-是的

translation.en: Then it is given, if you will take it.
translation.zh:
如果你们愿意接受的话
我就会款待你们

translation.en: I'm at my summer camp, a poor place.
translation.zh:
我在我夏天的营地
那是个简陋的地方

translation.en: Well, to me it seems a poor place. Some men find it marvelous.
translation.zh:
对我来说那是个简陋的地方
有些人会觉得那里很好

translation.en: Tomorrow, maybe I will allow the Turks to buy you, friends of Feisal.
translation.zh:
明天也许我会允许土耳其人买下你
费萨尔的朋友
和奥达共进晚餐，英国人
和哈威塔特人共进晚餐，哈里斯人

translation.en: It is my pleasure that you dine with me in Wadi Rumm!
translation.zh: 我很荣幸能和你们在瓦迪拉姆用餐

translation.en: This thing you work against Aqaba...
...what profit do you hope from it?
We work it for Feisal of Mecca.
translation.zh:
我们是为了麦加的费萨尔
才这么做的

translation.en: The Harith do not work for profit.
translation.zh: 哈里斯人做事不为利益

translation.en: Well, if it is in a man to be a servant, Sherif Ali...
translation.zh: 如果有人注定要做仆人，阿里首领

translation.en: ...he could find worse masters than Feisal.
translation.zh: 还有比费萨尔更差劲的主人

translation.en: You permit the Turks to stay in Aqaba.
translation.zh: 你允许土耳其人留在亚喀巴

translation.en: We do not work this thing for Feisal.
translation.zh: 我们这么做不是为了费萨尔

-那么是为了英国人？
-为了阿拉伯人

translation.en: The Howeitat, Ageyil, Ruala, Beni Sahkr, these I know.
translation.zh:
哈威塔特，阿吉亚尔，鲁阿拉
班尼夏卡尔，这些我都知道

translation.en: I have even heard of the Harith.
translation.zh: 我甚至听说过哈里斯人

translation.en: They're a tribe of slaves. They serve the Turks.
translation.zh: 他们是奴隶，他们服侍土耳其人

translation.en: Well, they are nothing to me.
translation.zh: 他们对我而言一文不值
我的部落是哈威塔特部落
我们做事只为了让奥达快乐

translation.en: And Auda's pleasure is to serve the Turks.
translation.zh:
而奥达的快乐
来自于服侍土耳其人

translation.en: It is the servant who takes money.

translation.zh:
-奥达·阿布·塔西会服侍人吗？
-不

translation.en: I carry 23 great wounds, all got in battle.
translation.zh:
我身上有23处伤痕
都是在战争中受的伤

translation.en: 75 men have I killed with my own hands, in battle.
translation.zh: 我在战争中亲手杀了75个人

translation.en: I scatter, I burn my enemies tents. I take away their flocks and herds.
translation.zh:
我屠杀、焚烧敌人的帐篷
我抢走他们的族人和牲畜

translation.en: The Turks pay me a golden treasure, yet I am poor!
translation.zh:
土耳其人付给我金子
但我还是很穷

translation.en: Because I am a river to my people.
And yet now it seems Auda has grown old.
translation.zh: 然而现在奥达似乎老了

translation.en: And lost his taste for fighting.
It is well you say it in my tent, thou old tulip.
translation.zh:
你胆敢在我的帐篷里说这话
真是大胆

translation.en: Yet this is a tulip that the Turks could not buy.
translation.zh:
这个胆大的人
是不会被土耳其人收买

translation.en: I will tell you what they pay me, and you will tell me if this is...
translation.zh:
我告诉你他们付给我多少钱
你来告诉我这是不是…

translation.en: They pay me, month by month...
-Who told you that? -I have long ears.
And a long tongue between them.

translation.zh:
100跟150有什么区别？
不过是一点点钱

translation.en: A trifle which they take from a great box they have.
translation.zh:
他们从一个大箱子
拿出一点钱
你像女人一样令我心烦

translation.en: Friends, we've been foolish. Auda will not come to Aqaba.
translation.zh:
朋友们，我们太愚蠢了
奥达不会去亚喀巴的

translation.en: Nor to drive away the Turks.
translation.zh: 也不是为了赶走土耳其人

translation.en: Thy mother mated with a scorpion.
Tomorrow we will go and get it.

translation.zh:
-你认为我们应该那样做吗？
-是的

translation.en: If you are right about the guns.
translation.zh:
如果确实如你所说
枪口对着大海的话

translation.en: This is the end of Aqaba.
One of our men murdered Auda's man.
translation.zh: 我们的人杀了奥达的人

translation.en: Theft? Blood feud? It makes no matter why.
translation.zh: 偷窃？世仇？为什么并不重要
这是部落之间的世代仇恨

translation.en: I didn't come here to watch a tribal bloodbath.
translation.zh: 我不是来这里看部落血战的

translation.en: The law says the man must die.
If he dies, will that content the Howeitat?
translation.zh:
如果他死了，哈威塔特人
就满意了吗？

translation.en: If none of Lord Auda's men harms any of yours...
translation.zh: 如果奥达的人不伤害你的人

translation.en: Then I will execute the law.
That that he killed was the man he brought out of the Nefud.
translation.zh:
他杀的那个人是他从内夫得沙漠
救回来的

translation.en: It was execution, Lawrence. No shame in that.
translation.zh:
劳伦斯，你只是按法律办事
没什么可耻的

translation.en: You gave life and you took it.
translation.zh: 你给了他生命，再由你夺走

translation.en: Tribute for the prince. Flowers for the man.
translation.zh:
给王子的贡品
给英雄的鲜花

translation.en: I'm none of those things, Ali.
My God, I love this country.
Ali, get a message down the coast to Yenbo.
translation.zh: 阿里，把消息传到延布的海边去

translation.en: Tell Feisal to find boats, any boats...
translation.zh: 告诉费萨尔找船，什么船都行

translation.en: ...and bring the Arab army here to Aqaba, quickly.
translation.zh: 尽快把阿拉伯军队带到亚喀巴

translation.en: I'm going to tell the generals...
-With these? -They'll be all right with me.
translation.zh:
-跟这些人？
-他们和我一起会没事的

translation.en: Look, Ali. If any of your Bedouin arrived in Cairo and said:
translation.zh: 阿里，如果你的贝都因人去开罗说

translation.en: "We've taken Aqaba," the generals would laugh.
translation.zh: 我们占领了亚喀巴，将军们会笑的

translation.en: In Cairo you will put off these funny clothes.
translation.zh: 你去开罗，就会脱下这可笑的衣服

translation.en: You'll wear trousers and tell stories of our quaintness and barbarity...
translation.zh: 你会穿裤子，说我们如何古怪残暴

translation.en: There is no gold in Aqaba.
Did Auda come to Aqaba for gold?
translation.zh: 奥达来亚喀巴是为了黄金吗？

translation.en: For my pleasure, as you said.
translation.zh: 如你所说，我是为了荣幸
劳伦斯保证会有黄金的

translation.en: With gold, with guns, with everything.
translation.zh: 黄金，枪支和所有的一切

translation.en: And you will take the children?
He said there was gold here. He lied.
translation.zh: 他说这里有黄金，他撒谎了

translation.en: I told you, no rest till they know that I have Aqaba.
translation.zh:
我说过，直到他们知道
我拿下了亚喀巴再休息

translation.en: Have you two slept in beds?
Tomorrow the finest sheets in the finest room and hotel in Cairo.
translation.zh:
明天你们将住在开罗最好的宾馆
最好的房间盖最好的床单

translation.en: Then it shall be so, lord.
If we ride west, we must strike the canal.
translation.zh: 如果我们往西走，可以到运河那里

translation.en: There is room for both. It serves no purpose.
translation.zh: 骆驼可以坐下两个人，没必要走路

translation.en: And where the hell do you think you're going to, Mustapha?
translation.zh: 你们要去哪里，穆斯塔法？

translation.en: -Are you going to the officers' bar? -Yes.
You can't take him in there, sir.
What do you think you look like?
Get out! You must get out! Get out!
We want two large glasses of lemonade.
translation.zh: 我们想要两大杯柠檬汁

translation.en: -This is a bar for British officers. -We are not particular.
translation.zh:
-这是英国军官的酒吧
-我们不挑剔

translation.en: -Are you off your head? -No. Oddly enough I'm not.
translation.zh:
-你疯了吗？
-不，奇怪的是我没疯

translation.en: -Just clear out of here, will you? -Get that boy out of here.
translation.zh:
-离开这里，好吗？
-让那男孩出去

translation.en: Corporal, we'll have this one out anyway.
translation.zh: 下士，我们得把他赶出去

translation.en: -Get that wog out of here. -Clear off.

translation.zh:
-他是劳伦斯，长官
-加冰的柠檬汁

translation.en: Our side in this war has. The wogs have.
translation.zh:
我们的盟军攻下了亚喀巴
那些家伙成功了

translation.en: You mean the Turks have gone?
translation.zh: 你是说土耳其人离开了？

translation.en: No, they're still there but they've no boots.
translation.zh:
不，他们还在那里
但他们被俘虏了

translation.en: Prisoners, sir. We took them prisoners. The entire garrison.
translation.zh:
战俘，长官，我们俘虏了他们
整个守备队

translation.en: That's not true. We killed some.
translation.zh: 不是的，我们杀了一部分

translation.en: Too many, really. I'll manage it better next time.
translation.zh: 真的太多人了，我下次会做得更好

translation.en: There's been a lot of killing one way or another.
translation.zh: 不论如何都会死很多人

translation.en: Cross my heart and hope to die, it's all perfectly true.
translation.zh: 我发毒誓，我说的是真话

-艾伦比将军？
-他是总司令，摩雷走了

translation.en: That's a step in the right direction.
First I want a room. With a bed, with sheets.
translation.zh: 首先我要一间房，有床有被单

translation.en: Right. You want a bed yourself, don't you?
translation.zh: 好的，你也想要一张床吧

translation.en: You'd better get into some trousers too.
You're an interesting man, there's no doubt about it.
-It's the Turkish route to the canal. -Not anymore.
translation.zh:
-那是土耳其人到运河的路线
-不再是了

translation.en: -They're coming through Beersheba. -I know, but we've gone to Gaza.
translation.zh:
-他们从贝尔谢巴过去
-我知道，但我们进入了加萨

translation.en: -So? -So that left Aqaba behind your right.
translation.zh:
-所以？
-所以拿下亚喀巴对你很重要

translation.en: And it will be further behind your right when you go for Jerusalem.
translation.zh:
当你拿下耶路撒冷
它对你来说就更重要了

translation.en: It threatened El' Arîsh and Gaza.
translation.zh: 它能威胁艾尔阿里什和加萨

translation.en: Do you think we should shift them out of Medina now?
translation.zh:
你认为我们现在应该
将他们从麦地那转移出来吗？

translation.en: No. I think you should leave them there.
translation.zh: 不，我认为你应该把他们留在那

translation.en: You acted without orders, you know.
translation.zh: 你没接到命令就擅自行动

translation.en: Shouldn't officers use their initiative at all times?
translation.zh: 军官不该随时采取主动吗？
事实上不然，那样太危险了

translation.en: I don't think that's a very good idea.
I didn't ask you. I want you to go back...
translation.zh: 我没问你意见，我要你回去

translation.en: I killed two people. I mean, two Arabs.
I led him into a quicksand.
I had to execute him with my pistol.
translation.zh: 我得用我的手枪处死他

translation.en: There was something about it I didn't like.
That's all right. Let it be a warning.
translation.zh: 没关系，就把它当成警告

translation.en: Rubbish. Rubbish and nerves. You're tired.
What do you mean coming dressed like that? Amateur theatricals?
translation.zh:
你打扮成那样做什么？
业余戏剧演员？

translation.en: Let me see that hat thing or whatever it is.
translation.zh: 我来看看那个像帽子的东西

translation.en: How would I look in this, Harry?
What I'm trying to say is I don't think I'm fit for it.
translation.zh:
我想说的是，我不认为
我适合这工作

translation.en: Really? What do you think, Dryden?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你怎么看，德莱顿？

translation.en: Before he did it, sir, I'd have said it couldn't be done.
translation.zh:
在他成功之前，长官
我会说那是不可能的

translation.en: I think you should recommend a decoration, sir.
translation.zh: 我认为你应该建议给他颁勋章

translation.en: I don't think it matters what his motives were.
translation.zh: 我认为他的动机不重要

translation.en: It was a brilliant bit of soldiering.
-You've heard about this, Mr. Perkins? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-你听说了吗，柏金斯先生？
-是的，长官

translation.en: -What do you think about it? -Bloody marvelous, sir. Well done.
No, but I know a good thing when I see one.
If I need a breakthrough to Jerusalem, I must concentrate, not dissipate.
translation.zh:
如果我想要耶路撒冷那边有进展
我必须集中火力，而不是分散

translation.en: I fight like Clausewitz, then you fight like Saxe.
translation.zh:
我像克劳塞维茨一样作战
你像萨克森一样作战

translation.en: We should do very well indeed, shouldn't we?
translation.zh: 我们应该能做得很好，对吗？

translation.en: -Give us something to drink. -Of course, sir.
I'm here at the invitation of Major Lawrence.
translation.zh: 我应劳伦斯少校之邀而来

translation.en: So you hold bound the Turkish desert army?
translation.zh: 你牵制住土耳其沙漠军队了吗？
一千名阿拉伯人意味着一千把刀
不分昼夜他们随时待命

translation.en: That means 1000 packs of high explosives and 1000 crack rifles.
translation.zh: 那意味着一千包炸药和一千把步枪

translation.en: We can cross Arabia while Johnny Turk is still turning round.
translation.zh:
当土耳其人还在团团转时
我们可以穿过阿拉伯

translation.en: While he mends, I'll smash them somewhere else.
translation.zh:
他们忙着修理铁路时
我会在别处搞破坏

translation.en: In 13 weeks I can have Arabia in chaos.
translation.zh: 13周内，我能让阿拉伯陷入混乱

translation.en: Well, if we can see it, so can the Turk.
translation.zh:
如果我们能想到
土耳其人也能想到

translation.en: If he finds he's using four divisions to fend off a handful of bandits...
translation.zh:
如果他发现他用四个军队
对抗一群土匪

translation.en: He daren't withdraw. Arabia's part of his empire.
translation.zh:
他不敢撤退，阿拉伯
是他的帝国的一部分

translation.en: If he gets out now, he'll never get back again.
translation.zh:
如果他现在撤退
他就再也回不来了

-不知道谁能拥有此地
-没人可以
阿拉伯现在是阿拉伯人的了

translation.en: That's what I've told them anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我是这么告诉他们的

translation.en: That we'll let them drive the Turks out and then move in ourselves.
translation.zh:
我们是否会让他们赶走土耳其人
然后自己占领阿拉伯

translation.en: I've told them that that's false, that we have no ambitions in Arabia.
translation.zh:
我告诉他们不会那样的
我们对阿拉伯没兴趣

translation.en: I'm not a politician, thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地，我不是政治家

translation.en: Have we any ambition in Arabia, Dryden?
translation.zh: 我们对阿拉伯有兴趣吗，德莱顿？

translation.en: I want to know, sir, if I can tell them in your name...
translation.zh:
我想知道我是否能以你的名义
告诉他们

translation.en: 2000 small arms, not enough. I need five.
translation.zh: 两千轻武器不够，我需要五千件

translation.en: Money. It'll have to be sovereigns. They don't like paper.
translation.zh: 钱，我要金币，他们不喜欢纸钞

-路易斯枪支的指导老师
-好的

translation.en: -How much more? -25,000 now. A lot more later.
I'll give you every blessed thing I can...
translation.zh: 我会尽力提供你需要的东西

translation.en: ...because I know you'll use it. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 因为我知道你会用得上的，恭喜

translation.en: Thank you for your hospitality, gentlemen.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们的热情款待，先生们

translation.en: Are you really going to give them artillery, sir?
translation.zh: 你真的要给他们大炮吗，长官？

translation.en: Might be difficult to get it back.
Give them artillery and you've made them independent.
translation.zh: 给他们大炮，你就让他们独立了

translation.en: Then I can't give it to them, can I?
translation.zh: 那么我就不能给他们，是吗？

translation.en: I've got orders to obey, thank God.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地，我得遵守命令

translation.en: Excuse me, friend. Who do these bags belong to?
translation.zh:
打扰了，朋友
这些袋子是谁的？

translation.en: He is my master. I am his servant.
translation.zh: 他是我的主人，我是他的仆人

translation.en: Chicago Courier is my paper, but my work is syndicated in America.
translation.zh:
我是芝加哥快报的记者
但我的文章在美国多家报刊发表

translation.en: I understood so from your letter, Mr. Bentley.
translation.zh:
我从你的来信中了解到了
本特利先生

translation.en: -Where can I find Major Lawrence? -Is that what you have come for?
translation.zh:
-我到哪能找到劳伦斯少校？
-那是你来此的目的吗？

translation.en: Well, Mr. Bentley, you will find Major Lawrence with my army.
translation.zh:
本特利先生，劳伦斯
和我的军队在一起

translation.en: That's what I meant, sir. Where can I find your army?
translation.zh:
我就是这个意思，先生
我在哪能找到您的军队？

translation.en: -Last week they were near El Ghira. -Ghira?
translation.zh:
-上周他们在艾尔基拉附近
-艾尔基拉？

translation.en: Yes, I fear you have a long journey. Can you ride a camel?
translation.zh:
是的，恐怕你得长途跋涉了
你会骑骆驼吗？

translation.en: Avoid Mellaha, the Turks are there.
translation.zh: 避开马拉哈，土耳其人在那里

translation.en: In Mellaha now? They move fast.
translation.zh: 现在就在马拉哈了？移动速度很快

translation.en: But not so fast as we do, you will find.
translation.zh: 但没有我们快，你会知道的

translation.en: There's work for me there of a different kind.
translation.zh: 那里有别的工作等着我去做

translation.en: I understand you've been given no artillery.
translation.zh: 我知道你一直没得到大炮

translation.en: It restricts us to small things.
Watch out for Allenby. He's a slim customer.
I'll certainly watch out for him. You're being very sympathetic.
translation.zh: 我肯定会小心的，你很有同情心

translation.en: Your Highness, we Americans were once a colonial people.
translation.zh: 殿下，我们美国也曾是殖民地

translation.en: We naturally feel sympathetic to any people...
Also, my interests are the same as yours. You want your story told.
translation.zh:
我的目的和你一样
你希望世人知道你的故事

translation.en: I badly want a story to tell.
translation.zh: 我很需要一个这样的故事

translation.en: Ah, now you are talking turkey, are you not?
I will give you a guide and a letter.
translation.zh: 我会给你一位向导和一封信

translation.en: ...I will have some facts and figures put on paper for you.
translation.zh: 我会写下一些事实和数据给你

translation.en: You know that we are destroying the Turkish railways.
translation.zh: 你知道我们在破坏土耳其人的铁路

translation.en: Major Lawrence is in charge of all this, is he?
translation.zh: 劳伦斯少校负责此事，对吧？

translation.en: My army is made up of tribes.
translation.zh: 我的军队由多个部落组成

translation.en: The tribes are led by the tribal leaders.
Your people do think very highly of Major Lawrence?
translation.zh: 你的人对劳伦斯少校评价很高吗？
本特利先生，在这个国家…

translation.en: ...the man who gives victory in battle is prized...
One figure I can give you from my head...
Since starting this campaign four months ago, we have lost...
translation.zh: 自从四个月前战役开始，我们有…

translation.en: You remark the disproportion between our dead and wounded.
translation.zh: 你注意到死伤人数比例不平衡了吧
死亡人数是受伤人数的四倍

translation.en: That's because those too wounded to bring away, we ourselves kill.
translation.zh: 那是因为我们杀了那些受重伤的人

translation.en: We leave no wounded for the Turks.
translation.zh: 我们不把受伤的人留给土耳其人

translation.en: -You mean...? -We leave no wounded for the Turks.
translation.zh:
-你是说…
-我们不把受伤的人留给土耳其人

translation.en: In their eyes, we are not soldiers but rebels.
translation.zh:
在他们的眼中，我们不是士兵
而是反叛者

translation.en: Rebels, wounded or whole, are not protected by the Geneva Code...
translation.zh:
反叛者，无论受伤与否
不受到日内瓦公约的保护

translation.en: More harshly than I hope you can imagine.
Our own prisoners are taken care of until the British...
translation.zh: 我们的俘虏受到妥善照顾

translation.en: ...can relieve us of them, according to the Code.
translation.zh: 直到我们根据公约交给英国人

translation.en: -I should like you to notice that. -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
-我希望你能注意到这一点
-是的，先生

translation.en: Is that the influence of Major Lawrence?
translation.zh: 那是受到劳伦斯少校的影响吗？

translation.en: It's just that I heard in Cairo that...
translation.zh: 只是因为我在开罗听说…

translation.en: ...Major Lawrence has a horror of bloodshed.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯少校不喜欢杀人

translation.en: With Major Lawrence, mercy is a passion.
With me, it is merely good manners.
You may judge which motive is the more reliable.
translation.zh: 你可以判断哪一个动机更可信

translation.en: I'll do everything I have said...
...if you will tell me truly the nature of your interest...
translation.zh: 只要你诚实地告诉我，你为何对…
我的人和劳伦斯少校感兴趣

translation.en: It's very simple, sir. I'm looking for a hero.
translation.zh: 很简单，先生，我在找一位英雄

translation.en: Indeed. You do not seem a romantic man.
translation.zh: 没错，你看上去不像是浪漫的人

translation.en: But influential men back home believe it's time for America...
translation.zh: 但我家乡有权势的人认为

translation.en: ...to lend her weight to the struggle against Germany.
translation.zh: 美国是时候挺身对抗德国了

translation.en: I've been sent to find material to show our people that this war is....
translation.zh:
我被派来寻找材料
告诉国人这场战争…

translation.en: But to show it in its more adventurous aspects.
translation.zh: 而是以更冒险的角度报导

translation.en: You look for a figure who will draw your country towards war.
translation.zh: 你在寻找能让你的国家参战的人
劳伦斯就是你要找的人

translation.en: Jiminy! Never seen a man killed with a sword before.
translation.zh: 我从没见过被剑杀死的男人

translation.en: Why don't you take a picture?
How is it with thee, Lawrence?
You are using up your nine lives very quickly.
translation.zh: 你的九条命很快就会用光的

translation.en: He's a bit old-fashioned. He thinks these things will steal his virtue.
translation.zh:
他是老古董，他认为这东西
会吸走他的灵魂

translation.en: He thinks you're a kind of thief.
It's all right to take your picture?

translation.zh: 是的，长官，那是我的宝贝

translation.en: This looting has got to stop!
translation.zh: 必须停止这种洗劫行为

translation.en: It's theft. And theft makes thieves.
translation.zh: 这是偷窃，偷东西的就是小偷

translation.en: I would not say that to Auda.
translation.zh: 我不会对奥达说这些话

translation.en: Truly. Are not British soldiers paid?
translation.zh: 是的，英国士兵拿不到薪水吗？

translation.en: -They don't go home when being paid. -They are not free to.
translation.zh:
-他们拿到钱，就不想回家了
-他们无法自由地回家

translation.en: Well, there's another lot you've seen the last of.
He says they'll come back. Will they?
translation.zh: 他说他们会回来的，会吗？

translation.en: Look, Lawrence, how many men do you think you'll have left? 200?
translation.zh:
劳伦斯，你认为你还剩多少士兵？
两百人吗？

translation.en: Didn't you know? They can only kill me with a golden bullet.
translation.zh:
你不知道吗？他们用金子弹
才能杀死我

translation.en: It is for children. I have set myself to learn again.
translation.zh:
那是孩子看的书
我督促自己重学一遍

translation.en: You'll be a democracy in this country? You gonna have a parliament?
translation.zh:
你会在这个国家实行民主制吗？
你会成立国会吗？

translation.en: I will tell you that when I have a country.
translation.zh: 等我成立了国家，我再回答

translation.en: You answered without saying anything. That's politics.
translation.zh:
你回答了问题，但什么都没说
那就是政治

translation.en: Before I return to the fleshpots, which I shall be very glad to do...
translation.zh:
我回去过奢侈生活之前
我很乐意那么做

translation.en: ...may I put two questions to you, straight?
translation.zh: 我能直接地问你两个问题吗？

translation.en: I'd be interested to hear you put a question straight.
translation.zh: 我很想听你直接地问问题

translation.en: What, in your opinion, do these people hope to gain from this war?
translation.zh:
你认为这些人希望
从这场战争中得到什么？

translation.en: They hope to gain their freedom.
-There's one born every minute. -They're going to get it.
translation.zh:
-总会有人上当的
-他们会获得自由的

translation.en: I'm going to give it to them.
-The second question? -Well, I was going to ask...
...what is it that attracts you personally to the desert?
translation.zh: 沙漠有什么地方吸引你？

translation.en: I gave Math Budad two lamps for it.
translation.zh: 我给了马斯布达两盏灯

translation.en: The year is running out, Brighton.

translation.zh: 我必须找到荣耀的东西

translation.en: Now you may blow up my train.
translation.zh: 现在你可以炸掉我的火车了

translation.en: And what will you do now?
Now I go home. They will carry my toys.
translation.zh: 我现在回家，它们载着我的玩具

translation.en: They will carry my toys too, see?
translation.zh: 他们也会带我的玩具走

translation.en: Major Lawrence will campaign this winter.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯少校今年冬天会发起战役

translation.en: But you got what you wanted, so you're going home, is that it?
translation.zh:
但你得到了你想要的
所以你回家了，是吗？

translation.en: Of course. When Lawrence has got what he wants, he will go home.
translation.zh:
当然，劳伦斯得到他想要的
他会回家的

translation.en: When you've got what you want, you will go home.
translation.zh:
当你拿到你想要的东西
你也会回家的

translation.en: Maybe. But I am not a deserter.
...that when he made you a fool, he gave you a fool's face.
translation.zh:
当他把你变成傻瓜时
他给了你一张傻瓜脸

translation.en: I must go, Lawrence, before I soil myself with a fool's blood.
translation.zh:
我得走了，劳伦斯
不然我会踩到傻瓜的血弄脏自己了

translation.en: Like talking to a brick wall.
So what will you do now? What can you do?
translation.zh: 你现在怎么做？你能怎么做？

translation.en: Allenby wanted the Arab army behind Deraa.
translation.zh:
艾伦比希望阿拉伯军队
撤到德拉后面

translation.en: Then that's where I'll take it.
Tell Allenby to hurry up, or we'll be in Deraa before he's in Jerusalem.
translation.zh:
让艾伦比加快速度，不然
在他到耶路撒冷前，我们就到德拉了

translation.en: -Pardon, Lawrence. I put-- -Plenty of time. Fetch another.
translation.zh:
-对不起，劳伦斯，我放在…
-时间还很多，再拿一个来
他没法骑骆驼了，劳伦斯，看啊

translation.en: If they take him alive, you know what they'll do to him.
translation.zh:
如果他们活捉他
你知道他们会做什么

translation.en: Daud will be angry with you.
What would you recommend me to do?
He hasn't 1/10 so many men, sir.
translation.zh: 他的士兵不到十分之一，长官

translation.en: Yes and no. He doesn't claim to have done anything he hasn't done.
translation.zh:
是也不是，他没有说他做了
他根本没做的事

translation.en: Then there is an Arab north army.
translation.zh: 那么确实有阿拉伯北部军队了

translation.en: -No, sir, he has lied about that. -Any idea why?
translation.zh:
-不，长官，他在这点上撒谎了
-知道为什么吗？

translation.en: -It's his army, I suppose. -It's Prince Feisal's army.
translation.zh:
-我猜那是他的军队
-费萨尔的军队

translation.en: Do you think he's gone native, Harry?
translation.zh:
你认为他会向费萨尔投诚吗
哈利？

translation.en: He would if he could, I think.
translation.zh: 我认为如果可以，他会那么做的

translation.en: -Not my line of country. -It doesn't matter. Just curious.
translation.zh:
-我忠心爱国
-这不重要，我只是好奇

translation.en: What matters is I believed it.
They are offering 20,000 pounds for him.
translation.zh: 他们悬赏两万英镑要他的人头

translation.en: -Shouldn't say he had long to live. -Whatever else, he's a brave man--
translation.zh:
-看来他活不久了
-不管怎样，他是勇敢的人…

translation.en: Surely, surely. If he's still going north with 50 men, he doesn't lack guts.
translation.zh:
是的，如果他带着50人向北行
他确实很有胆量

translation.en: I wonder if they'd offer that much for me.
translation.zh:
不知道他们是否会出那么多钱
悬赏我的人头

translation.en: What about next year? Will they still come back?
translation.zh: 明年呢？他们仍会回来吗？

translation.en: -They think he's a kind of prophet. -They do or he does?
translation.zh:
-他们认为他是先知
-他们认为或者他确实是？

translation.en: One more failure and you will find yourself alone.
translation.zh: 再失败一次，你就得孤军作战了

translation.en: -I do not include myself. -I do not include the others.
translation.zh:
-不包括我自己
-不包括其他人

translation.en: The more reason to be thrifty with them.
translation.zh: 所以你更应该对他们要求低些

translation.en: Give them something to do that can be done. But you, no.
translation.zh: 给他们能成功的任务，但你没有

translation.en: They must move mountains, walk on water.
translation.zh: 他们必须移山，在水面上行走

translation.en: Who are you to know what can be done?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道什么是能成功的事？

translation.en: If we'd done what you thought could be done, we'd be in Yenbo now.
translation.zh:
如果我们做了你认为能成功的事
我们现在就在延布了

translation.en: Whatever I ask them to do can be done. They know that if you don't.
translation.zh:
我要求他们做的都是能做到的
他们知道，你不知道

translation.en: Do you think I'm just anybody?
translation.zh: 你认为我和其他人一样吗？

translation.en: My friends, who will walk on water with me?
translation.zh:
我的朋友们，谁愿意和我
一起在水面上行走？

translation.en: -Who will come with me into Deraa? -Deraa is garrisoned.
translation.zh:
-谁和我一起去德拉？
-德拉戒备森严

translation.en: -I'll go by myself if I have to. -Why?
translation.zh:
-如果有必要，我自己去
-为什么？

translation.en: Because I told the English generals...
translation.zh: 因为我告诉英国的将军们

translation.en: ...the Arab revolt would be in Deraa when they'd be in Jerusalem.
translation.zh:
他们拿下耶路撒冷的时候
阿拉伯暴动会在德拉
是为了英国将军们来这里的？

translation.en: This afternoon I will take the Arab revolt into Deraa...
translation.zh: 今天下午，当阿拉伯人还在争论
我要带阿拉伯暴动进入德拉

translation.en: Can you pass for an Arab in an Arab town?
translation.zh:
你在阿拉伯城镇里
能假扮成阿拉伯人而不被认出吗？

translation.en: Yes. If one of you would lend me some dirty clothes.
translation.zh: 是的，如果你们借我一些脏衣服
宣告我已到这里的方法

translation.en: -Do you not see how they look at you? -Peace, Ali, I am invisible.
translation.zh:
-你不知道他们怎么看你吗？
-冷静，阿里，我是隐形的

translation.en: -I say you have blue eyes. -Yes, effendi.

translation.zh:
-你是切尔克斯人吗？
-是的，先生

translation.en: You look older. You have had a lot of experience.
translation.zh: 你看上去要老些，你很有经验

translation.en: He wouldn't know an interesting face from a sow's belly.
translation.zh: 他根本不知道有趣的脸是什么

translation.en: I have been is Deraa now for three and a half years.
translation.zh: 现在我到德拉有三年半了

translation.en: If they posted me to the dark side of the moon, I could not be more...
translation.zh: 如果他们把我派去月亮黑暗的那面

translation.en: You haven't the least idea what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 你不知道我在说什么吧

translation.en: Not that it matters at all.
A man cannot be always in uniform.
You have a body, like other men.
translation.zh: 你和其他人一样是血肉之躯

translation.en: Rest, rest. Can you not learn?
I've come to the end of myself, I suppose.
And the end of the Arab revolt?
I'm not the Arab revolt, Ali. I'm not even Arab.
translation.zh:
我不是阿拉伯叛乱，阿里
我甚至不是阿拉伯人

translation.en: A man can be whatever he wants. You said.
translation.zh: 你说过人可以成为他想成为的人

translation.en: I'm sorry. I thought it was true.
That's me. What color is it? That's me.
And there's nothing I can do about it.
A man can do whatever he wants. You said.
translation.zh: 你说，人能做他想做的任何事

translation.en: ...but he can't want what he wants.
This is the stuff that decides what he wants.
translation.zh: 这决定了他想要什么东西

translation.en: You may as well know. I would've told them anything.
translation.zh:
你知道也无妨
我可能会告诉他们一切

translation.en: I would've told them who I am. I would've told them where you were.
translation.zh:
我会告诉他们我是谁
我会告诉他们你们在哪

-我想说的
-任何人都会那么做的

translation.en: Well, any man is what I am.
And I'm going back to Allenby to ask him for a job...
Look, Ali, I think I see a way of being just...
...having led them here, have you no care for them?
translation.zh:
你带他们来这里
你不在乎他们吗？

translation.en: You lead them. They're yours. Trust your own people.
translation.zh:
你带领他们，他们是你的手下
相信你的同胞

translation.en: And let me go back to mine.
-I say, don't forget those form fives. -All right.
-Good to be back. -We heard you were, sir.
translation.zh:
-很高兴能回来
-我们听说你回来了，长官

translation.en: Nothing much. Wrong time of year. What's doing here?
translation.zh:
没什么，现在时机不对
这里怎么样？

translation.en: We're settling in. We built a squash court.
translation.zh:
我们正要安顿下来
我们建了一个壁球场

translation.en: Well, I have to go up there.

translation.zh: 这是借来的，有人把我的偷走了

translation.en: Jolly good about the squash court.
translation.zh: 很高兴我们有了壁球场

translation.en: Lays it on a bit thick, doesn't he?
-I'll believe you, sir. -No, really it is.
Morning. You're to go right in.

translation.zh: 或者我该称呼你劳伦斯少校？

translation.en: Well, general, I will leave you.
Major Lawrence doubtless has reports to make...
translation.zh: 劳伦斯少校毫无疑问要做报告
谈谈我的人民，他们的弱点

translation.en: ...and the need to keep them weak in the British interest.
translation.zh: 以及让他们为英国服务的必要性

translation.en: And the French interest too. We must not forget the French.
translation.zh: 还有法国，我们不能忘了法国

translation.en: I told you, sir, no such treaty exists.
translation.zh: 先生，我说过不存在这种条约

translation.en: Yes, general, you have lied most bravely, but not convincingly.
translation.zh:
是的，将军，你很大胆地撒谎
但不够令人信服

translation.en: I know this treaty does exist.
translation.zh: 我知道一定存在这种条约

translation.en: He does it better than you, general.
But then, of course, he is almost an Arab.
translation.zh: 但当然了，他几乎是阿拉伯人了

translation.en: It's my request for release from Arabia, sir.
translation.zh: 是我要求撤出阿拉伯的申请信，长官

translation.en: You sure you haven't heard of the Sykes-Picot Treaty?
translation.zh: 你没听说过塞克斯皮克特条约？

translation.en: Mr. Sykes is an English civil servant.
translation.zh: 塞克斯先生是英国公务员

translation.en: Monsieur Picot is a French civil servant.
translation.zh: 皮克特先生是法国公务员

translation.en: Mr. Sykes and Monsieur Picot met, and they agreed that after the war...
translation.zh:
塞克斯和皮克特遇见了
他们同意在战争结束后

translation.en: ...France and England should share the Turkish Empire.
translation.zh: 法国和英国应该分享土耳其帝国

translation.en: They signed an agreement, not a treaty, sir.
translation.zh: 他们签署了协议，不是条约

translation.en: There may be honor among thieves, but there's none in politicians.
translation.zh: 小偷也许还有尊严，但政客无耻

translation.en: And let's have no displays of indignation.
You may not have known, but you certainly had suspicions.
translation.zh: 你也许不知道，但你肯定怀疑过

translation.en: If we've told lies, you've told half-lies.
translation.zh:
如果我们撒了谎
你就是撒了一半的谎

translation.en: And a man who tells lies, like me, merely hides the truth.
translation.zh: 像我这样说谎的人只是掩藏真相

translation.en: But a man who tells half-lies has forgotten where he put it.
translation.zh: 但只说一半谎话的人忘记了事实

translation.en: The truth is I'm an ordinary man.
You might have told me that, Dryden.
translation.zh: 你已经跟我说过了，德莱顿

translation.en: And I want an ordinary job, sir.
translation.zh: 我想要一份普通的工作，长官

translation.en: Personal? You're a serving officer in the field.
translation.zh: 私人原因？你是战场上服役的军官

translation.en: And as it happens, a damned important one. Are you mad?
translation.zh: 你恰好是重要的人物，你疯了吗？

translation.en: No, and if you don't mind, I'd rather not go mad.
translation.zh: 不，如果你不介意，我不想发疯

translation.en: Look, I'm making my big push on Damascus the 16th of next month...
translation.zh:
下个月16号我在大马士革
有个大计划

translation.en: Can you understand that? You're an important part of the big push!
translation.zh: 你明白吗？你是其中重要的一部分

translation.en: I don't want to be part of your big push!
translation.zh: 我不想成为你的计划的一部分

translation.en: I have no Arab friends! I don't want Arab friends!
translation.zh:
我没有阿拉伯朋友
我不要阿拉伯朋友

translation.en: What in hell do you want, Lawrence?
translation.zh: 你究竟想要什么，劳伦斯？

translation.en: I've told you, I just want my ration of common humanity.
translation.zh: 我说过了，我想要做普通人
没什么，抱歉打断你们了，长官

translation.en: That's all right. Thank you, Mr. Dryden.
translation.zh: 没关系，谢谢，德莱顿先生

translation.en: Say, what goes on in there?
-No, really. Nothing at all. -Is the man in trouble?
translation.zh:
-不，真的，没什么
-他遇到麻烦了吗？

translation.en: I expect so. We all have troubles. Life's a vale of troubles.
translation.zh:
是的，我们都有麻烦
生活充满了麻烦

translation.en: Let me know if the man's in trouble. I've got a claim in that man.
translation.zh:
如果他遇到麻烦就告诉我
我得为此负责

translation.en: -What claim? -I've made that boy a hero.
translation.zh:
-负责什么？
-我让那男孩成了英雄

translation.en: When the war's over, he can be anything he wants.
translation.zh: 战争结束后，他想做什么都行

translation.en: Yes. Well, at the moment he wants to be somebody else.
translation.zh: 是的，现在他想做普通人

translation.en: Will you kindly allow me to pass?
It's a clash of temperament that's going on in there.

translation.zh: 这是不可避免的，一个人半疯了

translation.en: I believe your name will be a household word...
translation.zh: 我相信你的名字将家喻户晓

translation.en: ...when you'd have to go to the war museum to find who Allenby was.
translation.zh:
而你得去战争博物馆
才知道艾伦比是谁

translation.en: You're the most extraordinary man I ever met.
translation.zh: 你是我遇到过最出色的人

translation.en: -Leave me alone. -That's a feeble thing to say.
-I know I'm not ordinary. -That's not what I'm saying.
translation.zh:
-我知道我不平凡
-我不是那个意思

translation.en: Not many people have a destiny, Lawrence.
translation.zh: 没多少人有天命的，劳伦斯

translation.en: It's a terrible thing for a man to flunk it if he has.
translation.zh: 如果那样的人失败了，会很糟糕的

translation.en: Why suppose that? We both know I'm right.
translation.zh:
为何那么假设？
我们都知道我说得对

translation.en: I'll give you a lot of money.
They won't be coming for money, not the best of them.
translation.zh: 他们不会为钱作战，至少豪杰不会

translation.en: Which I'm going to give them.
All you want is someone holding down the Turkish Right.
translation.zh: 你想要有人镇压土耳其人

translation.en: But I'm going to give them Damascus. We'll get there before you do.
translation.zh:
但我会把大马士革给他们
我们会赶在你们之前到的

translation.en: And when we've got it, we'll keep it.
translation.zh: 我们攻下之后，我们会留下它

translation.en: Tell the politicians to burn their paper now.
translation.zh: 让那些政客去烧掉协议

translation.en: Fair? What's fair got to do with it?
I shall want quite a lot of money.
The best of them won't come for money.
It's not for you, it's for Major Lawrence.
translation.zh: 我不是拍你，是拍劳伦斯少校

translation.en: He doesn't mind having his picture taken. He doesn't mind at all.
Have you met Major Lawrence since he's come back?
translation.zh: 劳伦斯回来后,你见过他吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'd say he had. Different man, I'd say.
translation.zh: 我认为他变了，不一样了

translation.en: What did that Turkish general do to him in Deraa?
translation.zh: 德拉的土耳其将军对他做了什么？

translation.en: He was the same man after Deraa. The same man, humbled.
translation.zh:
他从德拉回来后还是原来的他
同一个人，谦虚

translation.en: What did the English general do to him in Jerusalem?
translation.zh:
耶路撒冷的英国将军
对他做了什么？

translation.en: He told me to gather the Harith here.
translation.zh: 他让我把哈里斯人聚集在这里

translation.en: There is not a man without a price on his head.
translation.zh: 这里每个人的人头都是有价格的

translation.en: -There's a price on my head too. -But these are murderers.
translation.zh:
-也有人悬赏我的人头
-但这些是谋杀犯

translation.en: The sheiks will hang these men.
Lawrence, these things know nothing of the Arab revolt.
translation.zh: 劳伦斯，这些人不了解阿拉伯叛乱

translation.en: -You have bought these things. -I bought half the men here, Ali.
translation.zh:
-你买了这些人
-我买了这里一半的人，阿里

translation.en: That is different. These are not ordinary men.
translation.zh: 那不一样，他们不是普通人

translation.en: I don't want ordinary men. Hut!
Very well, gentlemen. The cavalry's gone through Mazril and Deraa.
translation.zh:
很好，先生们，骑兵过了马兹瑞尔
和德拉

translation.en: Very good, by the way. Very good indeed. Now your turn.
If the enemy's retreating in any order, which we'll assume--
translation.zh:
如果敌人撤退，我们认为
他们肯定会撤退

translation.en: He can't be far from Mallud...
...in which case I can have him within range by 0900 hours tomorrow.
translation.zh: 那样明天九点，他就在射程之内了

translation.en: These are the last infantry supports going up now.
translation.zh: 现在这是最后的步兵增援部队

translation.en: But Mallud, we could have the fusiliers there by Wednesday.
translation.zh: 但周三步兵会到马拉杜

translation.en: That'll do for now. The guns are what matter.
This Arab army on the right, sir, what's it consist of?
translation.zh:
右边的阿拉伯军队，长官
由什么组成？
非正式骑兵，长官，大约两千人

translation.en: -Can only know by being with them. -Then get with them. I want to know.
translation.zh:
-只有和他们在一起的人才知道
-那么就去找他们，我想知道

translation.en: God help the men who lie under that.
Well, he's got the bit between his teeth all right.
He's got the bit between his teeth all right.
I tell you, sir, I think he'll get to Damascus before we do.
translation.zh:
长官，我认为他会比我们
先到大马士革

translation.en: Well, there's a Turkish column in front of him, out of Mazril.
translation.zh:
他前面有个土耳其军队
就在马兹瑞尔外

translation.en: -What do the Turks have in Mazril? -A brigade, sir.
translation.zh:
-土耳其在马兹瑞尔部署了什么？
-一个旅，长官

translation.en: I wonder where they are now.
translation.zh: 我想知道他们现在在哪
大马士革，劳伦斯，大马士革
这曾是塔拉尔人的村落

translation.en: Does it surprise you, Mr. Bentley?
translation.zh: 这让你吃惊了吗，本特利先生？

translation.en: Surely you know the Arabs are a barbarous people.
translation.zh: 你知道阿拉伯人很野蛮

translation.en: Here, let me take your rotten bloody picture.
translation.zh: 我来给你这个混蛋拍照

translation.en: These were cut last night, Lawrence, in Damascus.
translation.zh: 这是昨晚在大马士革割的，劳伦斯

-艾伦比到大马士革了吗？
-快了
这是劳伦斯安排的，长官

translation.en: The whole town is plastered with the Arab flag.
translation.zh: 整个城市插满了阿拉伯旗帜

translation.en: They've been here a day and a night.
translation.zh: 他们已经来了一天一夜了

translation.en: They've occupied the town. They've done it.
translation.zh: 他们占领了这个城市，他们做到了

translation.en: He's set up his own headquarters in the town hall.
translation.zh: 他在市政厅设立了自己的总部

translation.en: What else beside the town hall?
translation.zh: 除了市政厅还占了什么？
医院，消防站，什么都占了，长官

translation.en: They call themselves the Arab National Council...
translation.zh: 他们称自己为阿拉伯国民议会
他们是你的问题了，哈利

translation.en: What should we do about it?
Get them out of it, sir, quick time.
translation.zh: 快点把他们赶出去，长官

translation.en: Not unless you want a full-scale rising.
translation.zh: 除非你想要引起大规模叛乱

translation.en: -What, then? -When will Feisal be in Damascus?
translation.zh:
-那要怎么做呢？
-费萨尔何时来大马士革？

translation.en: By special train in two days' time.
translation.zh: 两天内搭乘专用列车来

translation.en: Two days is what you asked for. I can't keep him out any longer.
translation.zh:
最多两天，超过了
我没办法再拖延

translation.en: -Ample, I should think. -We can't just do nothing.
translation.zh:
-我认为足够了
-我们不能什么都不做

translation.en: Why not? It's usually best. Get us something to drink, Tracey.
translation.zh:
为何不？通常这是最好的做法
崔西，给我们倒些饮料

translation.en: And Tracey, all troops to remain quartered until further orders.
translation.zh:
崔西，没有进一步命令
所有部队都扎营不准离开

translation.en: Does that apply to technical units?

translation.zh: 不是哈里斯人，也不是哈威塔特人
不是任何部落的人，而是效忠…

translation.en: ...of the Arab Council, acting for Prince Feisal.
translation.zh:
费萨尔王子领导的
阿拉伯议会的阿拉伯人

translation.en: Sherif Ali said that the telephones are in the care of the Howeitat...
translation.zh: 阿里首领说电话由哈威塔特人看管

translation.en: ...and they have ceased to work. And this is true.
They will not work because they are given no electricity.
translation.zh: 电话不通，是因为他们不供电

translation.en: The electricity is in the care of the Harith.
If you answer, there will be bloodshed.
translation.zh: 你一回答，就会血流成河

translation.en: You speak to me of bloodshed?
I ask pardon of Auda Abu Tayi.
translation.zh: 我请求奥达·阿布·塔西原谅我

translation.en: I have been to that electrical house, Lawrence.
translation.zh: 我去过发电厂了，劳伦斯

translation.en: They are of an incredible size, but helpless.
It is so of all machines.
Let them burn. What need of telephones?
translation.zh: 把它们烧了，电话有什么用？

translation.en: -The need is absolute. -Then we need English engineers.
translation.zh:
-有用
-那我们需要英国工程师

translation.en: No. Take English engineers and you take English government.
translation.zh:
不，英国工程师进来
英国政府也会跟着来

translation.en: -It is not a district that matters. -It will spread!
translation.zh:
-那地区不重要
-火灾会扩散的

translation.en: We have tried, but there is no force in the water.
translation.zh: 我们试过了，但水力不足

translation.en: -The Ruala do not carry water. -What else are they good for?
translation.zh:
-鲁阿拉人不会运水
-他们会做什么？

translation.en: We will hear petitions this afternoon.
translation.zh: 今天下午，我们才接受请愿书

translation.en: -I'll take this up after the war. -Surely we should do something, sir.
translation.zh:
-我战后会玩这运动
-我们应该做些什么，长官

translation.en: -It's an old man's sport. -Are you an old man, sir?
translation.zh:
-这是老人的运动
-你是老人吗，长官？

translation.en: All I can say is, sir, it's a heavy responsibility.

translation.zh: 这些乞丐长得不错，是吗？

translation.en: Leave it, Lawrence. Come with me.
I tell you, this is nothing.
The desert has dried up more blood than you could think of.
translation.zh: 沙漠中晒干的血比你想象中还多

translation.en: I pray that I may never see the desert again.
translation.zh: 我祈祷再也不要见到沙漠了

translation.en: You will come. There is only the desert for you.
translation.zh: 你会来的，沙漠是你唯一栖身之处

translation.en: No, I shall stay here and learn politics.
translation.zh: 不，我要留在这里学习政治

translation.en: I had not thought of it when I met you.
translation.zh: 我遇到你时，没想过要这么做

translation.en: You have tried very hard to give us Damascus.
translation.zh: 你很努力，把大马士革给我们

translation.en: -He is your friend? -Take your hand away.
If I fear him, who love him...
...how must he fear himself, who hates himself?
translation.zh: 他得多怕自己，多恨自己？

translation.en: So you are not yet entirely politician.
Well, these are new tricks, and I am an old dog.
...being an Arab will be thornier than you suppose, Harith.
translation.zh: 做一个阿拉伯人比你想象中要难

translation.en: In all my years, I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 我一辈子都没见过这种事

translation.en: It comes within the jurisdiction of the Arab Council.
translation.zh: 这属于阿拉伯议会的管辖范围？

translation.en: Under the circumstances, I think I must take over. Immediately.
translation.zh:
在这种情况下
我认为我必须立刻接管

translation.en: Under any circumstances at all, you must obey your orders.
translation.zh: 在任何情况下，你必须服从命令

translation.en: Now, go over to the town hall and see what they say.
translation.zh: 去市政厅，听听他们说什么

translation.en: We did what we could in the civic hospitals.
translation.zh: 市立医院那边，我们已经尽力了

translation.en: But you forgot the Turkish Military Hospital.
translation.zh: 但你忘了土耳其军事医院

translation.en: It has 600 beds. There are about 2000 Turkish wounded in it.
translation.zh:
那里有六百个床位
大约两千名土耳其伤患

translation.en: All of whom are the responsibility of your precious Arab Council.
translation.zh: 他们都是阿拉伯议会的责任

translation.en: My friend Lawrence, if I may call him that.
translation.zh:
我的朋友劳伦斯
如果我可以这么称呼他的话

translation.en: How many men will claim the right to use that phrase? How proudly.
translation.zh: 有多少人有权这么说？多光荣

translation.en: He longs for the greenness of his native land.
He pines for the Gothic cottages of Surrey, is it not?
translation.zh: 他向往萨里的哥特式小屋

translation.en: Already in imagination, he catches trout...
translation.zh: 他在想象着，他在钓鲑鱼

translation.en: ...and all the activities of the English gentleman.
translation.zh: 参加英国绅士的所有活动

translation.en: That's me you're describing, sir, not Colonel Lawrence.
translation.zh:
你描述的是我，先生
而不是劳伦斯上校

translation.en: Take the honor, colonel. Be a little kind.
translation.zh: 接受这荣誉吧，上校，友好点

translation.en: As a colonel, you'll have a cabin to yourself on the boat home.
translation.zh:
作为一名上校
在船坞那边你会得到一栋小木屋

translation.en: There's nothing further here for a warrior.
We drive bargains. Old men's work.
translation.zh:
我们在讨价还价
这是老头子的工作

translation.en: Young men make wars, and the virtues of war...
translation.zh: 年轻人制造战争，战争的本质

translation.en: Courage and hope for the future.
Then old men make the peace.
And the vices of peace are the vices of old men.
translation.zh: 和平的缺点就是老人的缺点

translation.en: What I owe you is beyond evaluation.
The powerhouse, the telephone exchange, these I concede.
The pumping plant I must retain.
If you retain it, there will be no water.
translation.zh: 如果你留下水厂，大家就没水用了

translation.en: -I shall be glad of assistance. -Then you must bring down your flag.
translation.zh:
-我会帮忙的
-那么你必须降下旗帜

translation.en: I shall not, and if your men attempt it, my men will resist it.
translation.zh:
我不会的，如果你的人要那么做
我的手下会反抗的

translation.en: It's a thing that makes an ugly incident.
translation.zh: 这种事会引发不好的事

translation.en: ...does not wish to appear at the peace conference as an aggressor.
translation.zh:
不希望以侵略者的身份
出现在和平会议上

translation.en: May I shake your hand, sir?
Just want to be able to say I'd done it, sir.
translation.zh: 只是想和别人吹嘘一下，长官

translation.en: No, no, sir, I should remember that.
translation.zh: 不，长官，我应该会记得的

translation.en: It is widely known the Arab Council took power in my name.
translation.zh:
大家都知道阿拉伯议会
以我的名义得到权力

translation.en: They have no power. It's illusory.
translation.zh: 他们没有权力，那是幻觉
幻觉有时候也会很强有力

translation.en: The world is delighted at the picture of Damascus...

translation.zh: 大马士革被阿拉伯军队解放了

translation.en: Led, may I remind you, by a British-serving officer.
translation.zh:
我得提醒你
那是英国服役军官领导的

translation.en: Ah, yes. But then Lawrence is a sword with two edges.
translation.zh: 是的，但劳伦斯像是双刃剑

translation.en: We are equally glad to be rid of him, are we not?
translation.zh: 我们也很想摆脱他，不是吗？

translation.en: I thought I was a hard man, sir.
translation.zh: 我还以为我是个狠心人，先生

translation.en: ...it seems we're to have a British waterworks...
Do you think it was worth it?
Not my business. Thank God I'm a soldier.
translation.zh: 那不关我的事，谢天谢地，我是士兵
你是这个大和解的主要推手

translation.en: On the whole, I wish I'd stayed in Tunbridge Wells.
translation.zh:
总体而言，我希望我留在
汤布里奇井那里
